rules_text: [i]Proficiency[/i] – Whenever this creature becomes a target of an activated ability you control, return target nonland permanent card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter. Each ability source triggers this only once each turn.
notes:

OG_1:
Proficiency — Whenever you activate an ability targeting this creature, you gain 2 life. Each ability source triggers this only once each turn.
